definition: certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: Please attach a copy of verified document for place of birth and latest school report.
sentences.chinese: 請附出生地點證明文件及最近成績表副本。

sentences.english: any regulatory document certifying the legal status of the two parties to the contract.
sentences.chinese: 簽約雙方法律地位的證明文件。

sentences.english: Toss those papers out, they are useless.
sentences.chinese: 把那些證明文件扔掉吧，沒用了。

sentences.english: Capital Verification Report at start-up or other relevant documentary evidence at its start-up.
sentences.chinese: 開辦時的驗資報告或者有關證明文件。

sentences.english: What documents I need to bring for the first tutoring appointment?
sentences.chinese: 第一次上堂補習或見面時，需要帶備什麼證明文件？

sentences.english: The applicant should provide the original and a photocopy of all documentary evidence for checking.
sentences.chinese: 申請人必須提供所有有關證明文件正本及副本供查覈。

sentences.english: Certificate issued by an overseas school (non-military) registered or filed with the government of R. O. C.
sentences.chinese: 我國政府核發之身分證明或其他證明文件。

sentences.english: Transaction user's personal identification details, contact telephone number.
sentences.chinese: 交易使用者的個人身份證明文件資料，聯絡電話。

sentences.english: Other documents certifying the truthfulness of the contents of the advertisements.
sentences.chinese: 確認廣告內容真實性的其他證明文件。

sentences.english: A document evidencing the approval of the code of practices by MOTC.
sentences.chinese: 公司營業規章經交通部覈定之證明文件。

sentences.english: Present the original and the photocopy of any supporting document when submitting the application form.
sentences.chinese: 遞交申請表時請出示有關證明文件之正本及影印本。

sentences.english: Applicators should submitted the operation plan and related certificates.
sentences.chinese: 申請者向公司呈報有關證明文件與經營計劃書。

sentences.english: Proof of identity of both the licensee and transferee .
sentences.chinese: 牌照持有人及準受讓人的身分證明文件。

sentences.english: How can they document their qualifications?
sentences.chinese: 他們該如何提供資格證明文件？

sentences.english: Document evidencing membership in the SITCA;
sentences.chinese: 同業公會同意入會之證明文件。

sentences.english: Documentary evidence is required to validate the claim.
sentences.chinese: 索賠須有證明文件方能有效。

definition: identity card/also written 身份證|身份证[shen1 fen4 zheng4]
to issue (a document)/to sign and issue officially
